column7: at south georgia medical center. funeral services will be held on monday
column10: at eleven a. m. in the chapel of the carson mc. lane funeral home. burial will follow at sunset hill cemetery. the family will visit at the funeral home on monday from 10 a. m. until service time. flowers will be accepted or donations may be made to the annette howell turner center for the arts or to central avenue church of christ. carson mc. lane funeral home is serving the family of mrs. smith. www. mclanecares. com. read morris smith 's and on mclanefuneralservices. com.
